item.title: Weekly Post Challenge
item.description: I recently set the home page of my browser to be Hacker News . I found it to be a distraction free way of finding out interesting stuff that’s happening in the tech industry. It’s also a really great way to find interesting blogs that aren’t on sites like Medium, as you’ll see from this post. Anyway, today I came across a post called I bought netflix.soy , a fantastic blog post written by Ben Stokes .
